messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] saxon math
messages.msgSnippet: I ve decided to keep them around to use as reference materials, but if I decide to sell them I ll definitely ask you for Ebay information.  Thanks. Rebecca
messages.messageBody:
I've decided to keep them around to use as reference materials, but if I decide to sell them I'll definitely ask you for Ebay information. Thanks.
Rebecca

nrskay <okmardesich@...> wrote:
I just wanted to chime in here. When we decided to unschool our dtr,
we had already purchased her curriculum like Saxon and other
textbooks. I auctioned them off on ebay and got a good price for all
of the stuff. If your interested in getting some of your money back,
email me and I can share with you some ideas.

Kay

messages.subject: saxon math
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to chime in here.  When we decided to unschool our dtr, we had already purchased her curriculum like Saxon and other textbooks.  I auctioned them
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to chime in here. When we decided to unschool our dtr,
we had already purchased her curriculum like Saxon and other
textbooks. I auctioned them off on ebay and got a good price for all
of the stuff. If your interested in getting some of your money back,
email me and I can share with you some ideas.

Kay
